member.summary: Represents an HTML node.

member.summary: Gets the name of a comment node. It is actually defined as '#comment'.

member.summary: Gets the name of the document node. It is actually defined as '#document'.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.HtmlNodeTypeNameText
member.summary: Gets the name of a text node. It is actually defined as '#text'.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.ElementsFlags
member.summary: Gets a collection of flags that define specific behaviors for specific element nodes. The table contains a DictionaryEntry list with the lowercase tag name as the Key, and a combination of HtmlElementFlags as the Value.

member.summary: Initialize HtmlNode. Builds a list of all tags that have special allowances

member.summary: Initializes HtmlNode, providing type, owner and where it exists in a collection

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.CanOverlapElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node can be kept overlapped.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of an element node that can be kept overlapped, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.IsCDataElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node is a CDATA element node.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of a CDATA element node, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.IsClosedElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node is closed.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of a closed element node, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.IsEmptyElement(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if an element node is defined as empty.
member.param: The name of the element node to check. May not be null.
member.returns: true if the name is the name of an empty element node, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.Ancestors
member.summary: Returns a collection of all ancestor nodes of this element.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.AncestorsAndSelf

member.returns: The node added.

member.summary: Returns a collection of all descendant nodes of this element, in document order

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.Descendants
member.summary: Gets all Descendant nodes in enumerated list

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.Descendants(System.String)
member.summary: Get all descendant nodes with matching name

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.DescendantsAndSelf
member.summary: Returns a collection of all descendant nodes of this element, in document order

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.DescendantsAndSelf(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all descendant nodes including this node

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.GetAttributeValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to get the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, the default value will be returned.
member.param: The name of the attribute to get. May not be null.
The default value to return if not found.
member.returns: The value of the attribute if found, the default value if not found.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.GetAttributeValue(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Helper method to get the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, the default value will be returned.
member.param: The name of the attribute to get. May not be null.
The default value to return if not found.
member.returns: The value of the attribute if found, the default value if not found.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlNode.SetAttributeValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Helper method to set the value of an attribute of this node. If the attribute is not found, it will be created automatically.
member.param: The name of the attribute to set. May not be null.
The value for the attribute.
member.returns: The corresponding attribute instance.

member.summary: Gets or Sets the object and its content in HTML.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument
member.summary: Represents a complete HTML document.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionAddDebuggingAttributes
member.summary: Adds Debugging attributes to node. Default is false.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionAutoCloseOnEnd
member.summary: Defines if closing for non closed nodes must be done at the end or directly in the document. Setting this to true can actually change how browsers render the page. Default is false.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionCheckSyntax
member.summary: Defines if non closed nodes will be checked at the end of parsing. Default is true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionDefaultStreamEncoding
member.summary: Defines the default stream encoding to use. Default is System.Text.Encoding.Default.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceText
member.summary: Defines if source text must be extracted while parsing errors. If the document has a lot of errors, or cascading errors, parsing performance can be dramatically affected if set to true. Default is false.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionExtractErrorSourceTextMaxLength
member.summary: Defines the maximum length of source text or parse errors. Default is 100.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionFixNestedTags
member.summary: Defines if LI, TR, TH, TD tags must be partially fixed when nesting errors are detected. Default is false.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputAsXml
member.summary: Defines if output must conform to XML, instead of HTML.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOptimizeAttributeValues
member.summary: Defines if attribute value output must be optimized (not bound with double quotes if it is possible). Default is false.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputOriginalCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output with it's original case. Useful for asp.net tags and attributes

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionOutputUpperCase
member.summary: Defines if name must be output in uppercase. Default is false.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionReadEncoding
member.summary: Defines if declared encoding must be read from the document. Declared encoding is determined using the meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=XXXXX" html node. Default is true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionStopperNodeName
member.summary: Defines the name of a node that will throw the StopperNodeException when found as an end node. Default is null.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlDocument.OptionWriteEmptyNodes
member.summary: Defines if empty nodes must be written as closed during output. Default is false.

member.summary: The node is a CDATA node.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlEntity
member.summary: A utility class to replace special characters by entities and vice-versa. Follows HTML 4.0 specification found at http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/sgml/entities.html

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlEntity.DeEntitize(System.String)
member.summary: Replace known entities by characters.
member.param: The source text.
member.returns: The result text.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlEntity.Entitize(System.String)
member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.
member.param: The source text.
member.returns: The result text.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlEntity.Entitize(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.
member.param: The source text.
If set to false, the function will not use known entities name. Default is true.
member.returns: The result text.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlEntity.Entitize(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replace characters above 127 by entities.
member.param: The source text.
If set to false, the function will not use known entities name. Default is true.
If set to true, the [quote], [ampersand], [lower than] and [greather than] characters will be entitized.
member.returns: The result text

member.summary: A collection of entities indexed by name.

member.summary: A collection of entities indexed by value.

member.summary: Gets the line number of this error in the document.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseError.Reason
member.summary: Gets a description for the error.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseError.SourceText
member.summary: Gets the the full text of the line containing the error.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseError.StreamPosition
member.summary: Gets the absolute stream position of this error in the document, relative to the start of the document.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseErrorCode
member.summary: Represents the type of parsing error.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseErrorCode.TagNotClosed
member.summary: A tag was not closed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseErrorCode.TagNotOpened
member.summary: A tag was not opened.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseErrorCode.CharsetMismatch
member.summary: There is a charset mismatch between stream and declared (META) encoding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseErrorCode.EndTagNotRequired
member.summary: An end tag was not required.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Html.HtmlParseErrorCode.EndTagInvalidHere
member.summary: An end tag is invalid at this position.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.CaseFolding
member.summary: SGML is case insensitive, so here you can choose between converting to lower case or upper case tags. "None" means that the case is left alone, except that end tags will be folded to match the start tags.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.HWStack
member.summary: This stack maintains a high water mark for allocated objects so the client can reuse the objects in the stack to reduce memory allocations, this is used to maintain current state of the parser for element stack, and attributes in each element.

member.summary: This class represents an attribute. The AttDef is assigned from a validation process, and is used to provide default values.

member.summary: The SYSTEM literal in the DOCTYPE tag identifying the location of the DTD.

member.summary: The DTD internal subset in the DOCTYPE tag

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.SgmlReader.InputStream
member.summary: The input stream containing SGML data to parse. You must specify this property or the Href property before calling Read().

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.SgmlReader.WebProxy
member.summary: Sometimes you need to specify a proxy server in order to load data via HTTP from outside the firewall. For example: "itgproxy:80".

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.SgmlReader.Href
member.summary: Specify the location of the input SGML document as a URL.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.SgmlReader.StripDocType
member.summary: Whether to strip out the DOCTYPE tag from the output (default true)

member.name: P:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Sgml.SgmlReader.ErrorLog
member.summary: DTD validation errors are written to this stream.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Utilities.SortMergeGeneric``1(System.Collections.Generic.List{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``0})
member.summary: Sorts the passed in list based on the passed in comparer using a modified merge-sort algorithm.
member.param: The list to be sorted.
The comparer (must not be null).

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Utilities.SortMergeGeneric``1(``0[],``0[],System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``0})
member.summary: Sorts the passed in array based on the passed in comparer using a modified merge-sort algorithm. Optionally you can pass in a temporary array equal (or greater) in size to arr. The method will make use of that array instead of allocating one. If null is passed in, then it will allocate one. Merge sort should be used if the operation of comparing items is expensive.
member.param: Array to be sorted.
Null or a temporary array equal (or greater) in size to arr.
Comparer.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Documents.Core.Utilities.SortMergeGeneric``1(``0[],``0[],System.Collections.Generic.IComparer{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sorts the passed in array based on the passed in comparer using a modified merge-sort algorithm. Optionally you can pass in a temporary array equal (or greater) in size to arr. The method will make use of that array instead of allocating one. If null is passed in, then it will allocate one. Merge sort should be used if the operation of comparing items is expensive.
member.param: Array to be sorted.
Null or a temporary array equal (or greater) in size to arr.
Comparer.
Start index in the array.
End index in the array.
